toolingFieldDefinition.Label: Do RMA Receipt at Zero Cost

toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__externalid__c

toolingEntityParticle.Label: Search Index
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__searchindex__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is a short code used as a Sales Order Reason Code. Reason Codes are assigned at various events in the Sales Order process, for example when an order is cancelled.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: ZZZZ_Code
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soreason_code__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When checked, indicates that this Reason Code can be used on Contract Credits.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Use for Contract Credits
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soreason_contractcred__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is the detailed description of the Sales Order Reason Code.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Description
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soreason_desc__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is the Division associated with this SO Reason code
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Division
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soreason_div__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Unique identifier for the reason code.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Reason Code
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soreason_reason__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When checked, indicates that this Reason Code can be used on an Return Material Authorization (RMA) Receipt.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Use for RMA Returns
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soreason_rma__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When set, this is an override to the Default RMA Adjustment Account specified on SO Control > Warranty & RMA tab. When this Reason Code is used for ‘Reason for Return’ on a RMA, this is the RMA Adjustment Account that will be credited upon RMA Receipt.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: RMA Adjustment Account
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soreason_rmaadjacct__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__soreason__c.rstk__soreason_rmaadjacct__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deleteConstraint>Restrict</deleteConstraint> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <inlineHelpText>When set, this is an override to the Default RMA Adjustment Account specified on SO Control > Warranty & RMA tab. When this Reason Code is used for ‘Reason for Return’ on a RMA, this is the RMA Adjustment Account that will be credited upon RMA Receipt.</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>RMA Adjustment Account</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <referenceTo>rstk__syacc__c</referenceTo> <relationshipLabel>SO Reasons</relationshipLabel> <relationshipName>soreasons</relationshipName> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>true</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Lookup</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When set, when this Reason Code is used on an RMA, this Sub Ledger Account (aka Mfg Account) will be used as the Account debited upon receipt of the given RMA.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: RMA Receipt Debit Account
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soreason_rmadracct__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__soreason__c.rstk__soreason_rmadracct__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deleteConstraint>Restrict</deleteConstraint> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <inlineHelpText>When set, when this Reason Code is used on an RMA, this Sub Ledger Account (aka Mfg Account) will be used as the Account debited upon receipt of the given RMA.</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>RMA Receipt Debit Account</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <referenceTo>rstk__syacc__c</referenceTo> <relationshipLabel>SO Reasons (RMA Receipt Debit Account)</relationshipLabel> <relationshipName>rmadracctsoreasons</relationshipName> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>true</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Lookup</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When checked, rather than using the current cost of the item being returned, the cost will be set as $0 for RMA Receipts.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Do RMA Receipt at Zero Cost
toolingEntityParticle.MasterLabel: Do RMA Receipt at Zero Cost
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__soreason_zerormarcpt__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is an internal system field which is not currently displayed on any Rootstock User pages.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Trigger Options
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__triggeroptions__c
